title: Apple Siri Google Now Microsoft Cortana or talking on a smartphone Which distracts drivers most
text:
Apple Siri, Google Now, Microsoft Cortana or talking on a smartphone: Which distracts drivers most? 
ZDNet Friday 23rd October, 2015 
A new US study has found that using voice commands to send texts or change music settings is more distracting than talking on a smartphone while driving. 
...
